wc_npcs.name: Merle Ambrose
wc_npcs.role: Headmaster of Ravenwood & Main Quest Giver
wc_npcs.personality_summary: A wise, ancient, and powerful wizard who serves as the player's primary guide. He is kind-hearted, patient, and possesses a gentle sense of humor, though he can be serious and commanding when the situation demands it.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: As the Headmaster of Ravenwood School of Magical Arts, he is a close friend of Gamma and Bartleby and the former teacher of Malistaire Drake.

wc_npcs.name: Gamma the Owl
wc_npcs.personality_summary: Intelligent, a bit formal, and fiercely loyal to Headmaster Ambrose. Gamma is often the one to handle the more practical and administrative aspects of running Ravenwood.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: The faithful companion and assistant to Merle Ambrose at the Ravenwood School of Magical Arts.

wc_npcs.name: Bartleby
wc_npcs.role: The Living Heart of Wizard City
wc_npcs.personality_summary: Ancient, wise, and speaks in a slow, thoughtful manner. Bartleby is the source of much of the magic in Wizard City and holds a deep, ancient knowledge of the Spiral.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: A central figure in the creation of the Spiral, he is the living heart of Wizard City and a source of ancient wisdom.

wc_npcs.name: Cyrus Drake
wc_npcs.personality_summary: Cynical, sarcastic, and perpetually unimpressed. Professor Drake is a brilliant but difficult teacher who believes in pushing his students to their absolute limits. Beneath his harsh exterior lies a genuine, albeit well-hidden, concern for his students.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: The Professor of Myth at Ravenwood and the brother of the main antagonist, Malistaire Drake.

wc_npcs.name: Dalia Falmea
wc_npcs.personality_summary: Passionate, energetic, and encouraging. Professor Falmea embodies the spirit of the Fire School. She is enthusiastic about her students' progress and is a firm believer in the power of will and determination.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: The Professor for the School of Fire at Ravenwood.

wc_npcs.name: Halston Balestrom
wc_npcs.personality_summary: Eccentric, brilliant, and somewhat absent-minded. Professor Balestrom is a master of Storm magic and a gifted inventor, though he can sometimes get lost in his own thoughts and experiments.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: The Professor for the School of Storm at Ravenwood.

wc_npcs.name: Lydia Greyrose
wc_npcs.personality_summary: Calm, composed, and motherly. Professor Greyrose is a patient and nurturing teacher who emphasizes the importance of defense and resilience. She is a comforting presence in Ravenwood.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: The Professor for the School of Ice at Ravenwood.

wc_npcs.name: Moolinda Wu
wc_npcs.personality_summary: Gentle, serene, and deeply connected to nature. Professor Wu is a kind and compassionate teacher who instructs her students on the importance of healing and harmony.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: The Professor for the School of Life at Ravenwood.

wc_npcs.name: Dworgyn
wc_npcs.personality_summary: Timid, slightly goofy, and well-meaning. Dworgyn was Malistaire's former assistant and is initially hesitant to take on the role of professor. He is good-natured and genuinely wants to help the students of the Death school.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: The Professor for the School of Death and the former assistant to Malistaire Drake.

wc_npcs.name: Alhazred
wc_npcs.location: Krokotopia (Initially met via quest from Ambrose)
wc_npcs.personality_summary: Wise, formal, and a master of Balance magic. While his school is not physically in Ravenwood, he is introduced by Ambrose and serves as the Balance school professor.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: The Professor for the School of Balance, who guides students from his home in Krokotopia.

wc_npcs.name: Malorn Ashthorn
wc_npcs.personality_summary: A more traditional and serious Death magic practitioner. He initially guides young Necromancers before they are introduced to Dworgyn. He is knowledgeable and direct.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: A student of the School of Death who acts as the initial guide for new Necromancers.

wc_npcs.name: Sergeant Muldoon
wc_npcs.personality_summary: Gruff, by-the-book, and dedicated to his duty. Sergeant Muldoon is in charge of the guards of Olde Town and is concerned with maintaining order. He's the gatekeeper to the troubled streets.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: The captain of the Wizard City Guard, responsible for maintaining order and directing wizards to the city's trouble spots.

wc_npcs.name: Gloria Krendell
wc_npcs.personality_summary: A kind elderly woman with a sharp memory. Gloria Krendell holds important information about Sylvia Drake. She is gentle and asks for the player's help in retrieving a cherished scrapbook.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: A resident of Olde Town and a close friend of the late Sylvia Drake, Malistaire's wife.

wc_npcs.name: Private Connelly
wc_npcs.personality_summary: A nervous and overwhelmed guard. Private Connelly is stationed at the entrance to Unicorn Way and is struggling to deal with the sudden outbreak of dark magic.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: A member of the Wizard City Guard stationed on Unicorn Way.

wc_npcs.name: Ceren Nightchant
wc_npcs.personality_summary: A studious and concerned Life student. Ceren was sent by Professor Wu to investigate the corruption on Unicorn Way. He is brave but acknowledges his own limitations.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: A student of the School of Life, sent by his teacher Moolinda Wu to investigate Unicorn Way.

wc_npcs.name: Lady Oriel
wc_npcs.personality_summary: Regal, worried, and grateful. Lady Oriel is the queen of the fairies on Unicorn Way and is deeply troubled by the dark magic affecting her subjects.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: The queen of the fairies and the primary victim of Lady Blackhope's curse on Unicorn Way.

wc_npcs.name: Artur Gryphonbane
wc_npcs.personality_summary: A young and determined Storm student. Artur is trying to help the residents of Triton Avenue who are being terrorized by the undead. He is worried about his sister, Suzie.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: A student of the School of Storm and the brother of Suzie Gryphonbane.

wc_npcs.name: Suzie Gryphonbane
wc_npcs.personality_summary: Brave and resourceful. Suzie is captured by the forces on Triton Avenue but remains defiant. She is grateful to be rescued and is a capable young witch.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: A student of the School of Storm and the sister of Artur Gryphonbane, who is captured by the undead.

wc_npcs.name: Duncan Grimwater
wc_npcs.personality_summary: Arrogant, ambitious, and a bit shady. Duncan is a Death student who seems more interested in gaining power than in helping people. He has a thinly veiled admiration for Malistaire's power.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: A student of the School of Death who offers quests on Triton Avenue.

wc_npcs.name: Blad Raveneye
wc_npcs.personality_summary: A hardworking and concerned miller. Blad is the owner of the Four Falls Mill and is troubled by the undead infestation that is disrupting his business.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: A resident of Triton Avenue and owner of the Four Falls Mill.

wc_npcs.name: Nolan Stormgate
wc_npcs.personality_summary: A worried and responsible student. Nolan is trying to find his missing friends who were captured by the cyclopes on Cyclops Lane.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: A student of Ravenwood who initiates the quest to free Cyclops Lane.

wc_npcs.name: Romulus
wc_npcs.personality_summary: A wise and ancient being who provides guidance. Romulus is a ghost who offers cryptic but helpful advice to the player on how to deal with the cyclopes.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: A spirit of Cyclops Lane who provides guidance to the wizard.

wc_npcs.name: Private Quinn
wc_npcs.personality_summary: A determined but outmatched guard. Private Quinn is trying to hold the line against the fire elves and other fiery creatures that have taken over Firecat Alley.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: A member of the Wizard City Guard stationed in Firecat Alley.

wc_npcs.name: Alicane Swiftarrow
wc_npcs.role: Quest Giver and Prince of the Fire Elves
wc_npcs.personality_summary: Noble, desperate, and hopeful. Alicane is the prince of the fire elves and is seeking a cure for the curse that has afflicted his people.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: The prince of the Fire Elves, who are the primary victims of the curse in Firecat Alley.

wc_npcs.name: Gretta Darkkettle
wc_npcs.personality_summary: A seemingly helpful but ultimately treacherous witch. Gretta initially appears to be an ally but is later revealed to have her own dark agenda. She is cunning and manipulative.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: A witch secretly aligned with dark forces who manipulates the player in Firecat Alley.

wc_npcs.name: Mortis
wc_npcs.personality_summary: A somber and ancient tree spirit. Mortis resides in the dark and melancholic realm of Nightside. He is a source of knowledge and power for Necromancers.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: The ancient spirit tree of the School of Death.

wc_npcs.name: Prospector Zeke
wc_npcs.personality_summary: Adventurous, friendly, and always on the move. Prospector Zeke is a seasoned explorer who tasks the player with finding various hidden items throughout each world.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: An explorer of the Spiral who is always accompanied by his wife, Eloise Merryweather.

wc_npcs.name: Eloise Merryweather
wc_npcs.personality_summary: Creative, resourceful, and supportive of her husband's adventures. Eloise provides wizards with a way to customize their appearance through stitching.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: A seamstress of the Spiral and the ever-present, patient wife of Prospector Zeke.

wc_npcs.name: Harold Argleston
wc_npcs.personality_summary: A knowledgeable and dedicated librarian who assists players with information and quests related to the lore of the Spiral.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: The head librarian for the Ravenwood School of Magical Arts.

wc_npcs.name: Mr. Lincoln
wc_npcs.personality_summary: A cheerful and helpful shopkeeper. Mr. Lincoln is always ready to assist young wizards with their reagent needs for crafting and other magical pursuits.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: A merchant in The Commons specializing in crafting reagents.

wc_npcs.name: Hilda Brewer
wc_npcs.personality_summary: A friendly vendor who helps wizards replenish their health and mana potions, essential for surviving tough battles.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: A merchant in The Commons specializing in potions.

wc_npcs.name: Diego the Duelmaster
wc_npcs.personality_summary: A confident and skilled duelist who introduces players to the world of Player vs. Player combat. He is a master of strategy and encourages fair play.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: The master of the Dueling Arena, responsible for training wizards in PvP combat.

wc_npcs.name: Reginald Baxby
wc_npcs.personality_summary: A professional and knowledgeable vendor of magical wands. He helps wizards choose the right focus for their magical abilities.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: A merchant in the Shopping District specializing in wands.

wc_npcs.name: Mildred Farseer
wc_npcs.personality_summary: A vendor with a keen eye for magical headwear. She offers a variety of hats that provide both protection and style.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: A merchant in the Shopping District specializing in hats.

wc_npcs.name: Charles Taffy
wc_npcs.personality_summary: A friendly tailor who sells a wide array of magical robes. He ensures every wizard is properly outfitted for their adventures.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: A merchant in the Shopping District specializing in robes.

wc_npcs.name: Zoe
wc_npcs.personality_summary: A specialist in magical decks, helping wizards organize their spells for effective combat. She is practical and helpful.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: A merchant in the Shopping District specializing in decks.

wc_npcs.name: Shade of Malistaire
wc_npcs.personality_summary: A sorrowful and angry echo of the man Malistaire once was. This shade reveals the tragic motivation behind his turn to darkness â€“ the death of his wife, Sylvia. He is not a combatant, but a key narrative figure.
wc_npcs.role_in_story: An echo of Malistaire Drake, husband of the late Sylvia Drake, who provides the final piece of exposition for the Wizard City storyline.
